description: Hardwearing trousers in regular fit with pre-shaped knees – Greenland Trail Trousers M are made in G-1000 Eco, and reinforced with a double layer of fabric on the rear and knees. Versatile and simple, these trousers are perfect for everyday outdoor life as well as urban environments. They have two hand pockets and one knife pocket, openings for kneepads (an accessory) and adjustments at the leg endings.
name: Fjallraven Greenland Trail Trousers, Short - Mens
